text: Nia laangi e dolu nomuli, gei Paul gu haga dagabuli mai nia dagi digau o Jew. Di madagoaa ne dagabuli mai digaula gi di gowaa e dahi, gei mee ga helekai, “Ogu ihoo digau Israel! Au digi hai dahi mee e hai baahi ang gi nia daangada o tadau henua, be ang gi nia hangaahai mouli o tadau maadua mmaadua i mua, gei au ne galabudi i Jerusalem, gaa wanga gi digau o Rome.
